title: Friday Night
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Friday Night par Johnnie Mikel
I see the lights in your eyes
Sparkle like a Hollywood sign
Like having coffee at night
Sprayin’ champagne like confetti

Lose track of days
The way you keep me awake
Acting like it’s no work, all play
Rhythm got me burnin’ hot and ready

Baby, I came here to party
All of this liquor, I’m faded
Lifted like an elevator
So if you came here to party,
I’m always looking for crazy
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});


Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday

Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday night

Let’s turn it up and get down
Not sorry that we’re living this loud
They ain’t ever shutting us out
I just wanna rock your body steady

Don’t check the clock
Stuck inside a weekend, don’t stop

After party back at my spot
You got me burnin’ hot and ready

Baby, I came here to party
All of this liquor, I’m faded
Lifted like an elevator
So if you came here to party,
I’m always looking for crazy

Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday

Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday night


On and on, we can dance until the mornin’
If it comes, on and on and on and on
On and on, we can dance until the mornin’
If it comes, on and on and on and on

Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday

Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
I like the way you
Do it, do it, do it,
We about to live it up like Friday night
